title: Breaking Barriers: Coach U. Thamimunissa's Journey in Women's Football
excerpt: From state-level player to inspiring coach, U. Thamimunissa is reshaping the landscape of women's football in Chennai through dedication, discipline, and unwavering belief in her athletes. This feature explores her early years and coaching philosophy.

title: Talent FC: Building Champions On and Off the Field
excerpt: Coach Thamimunissa's newly founded Talent FC is more than a football clubâ€”it's a movement empowering young girls through sport, education, and character building. The article highlights the club's training programs and early successes.

title: The Coach Who Leads with Faith, Discipline, and Heart
excerpt: In an exclusive interview, Coach U. Thamimunissa shares her philosophy on coaching, the role of faith in her life, and her vision for the future of women's football in India. The profile discusses mentoring and community outreach.
